5/11/2016 Update: 1. NEW: Different cover image for English books 2. NEW: Cover page title in Table of Contents automatically adapts to the language of the book (Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese and English) 3. NEW: Add chapter title for contents before the first existing chapter title 4. NEW: Support keyboard shortcut Ctrl+A in textboxes 5. NEW: Better regex for chapter extraction
